title: The most spoken languages worldwide
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
The maximum Native speaker in millions 1311.0 is found at Languages Chinese and the minimum is found at Lahnda where Native speaker in millions is 119.0.
The highest value at Languages Chinese is 11.02x times more than the lowest value at Lahnda.
